comments.body: I think we can skip this one. We never promised stability of internal packages.
Even if we don't promise stability of internal packages, I think it's nice to include it here just in case some unfortunate soul like myself in the future is porting a library from 1.8 to 2.0.

diffHunk:
@@ -1,1 +96,100 @@| -----                                             | -----                                               |
| scala.collection.immmutable.Seq[T]                | List[T]                                             |
| scala.meta.internal.ast                           | scala.meta.internal.trees                           |
| scala.meta.Name.Qualifier                         | scala.meta.Name                                     |
| scala.meta.Term.Update                            | scala.meta.Term.Assign(Apply())                     |
